idea: Premier People Logistic has traversed a route filled with cutting edge experiences. Experiences that have seasoned us to face the challenges and demands of the highly competitive people transportation and Supply Chain Management industry in India. Over 300 top notch corporates stand testimony to our dedication and commitment of providing people transportation and supply chain management services that reflects our motto "Your Comfort is Our Concern".Leading player in people transportation, the company has diversified into other areas of logistics business such as Full Truck Load, Part Truck Load, Last Mile Deliveries and Hub Management services with a vision to service entire gamut of supply chain management.

idea: First Extract AgroTech Pvt Ltd (FEATPL) is an ISO 9000, ISO 22000 & HACCP Certified Company incorporated with an aim to deliver only the Best, 100% Pure, Certified & Natural Products to our Customers operating in both Organic & Non-Organic segment. This single idea inspired the journey of Brand “Amrut Shudh”... We partner with local producers from where we source our raw materials, ensuring continuous availability of high-quality produce throughout the year. Raw materials are carefully processed in the most traditional way to ensure YOU experience the magic of all the natural oils, flavours and aroma in every bite. Hence we proudly say, “Our Product Talks…” We aspire to serve our customers, the best Mother Nature has to offer with absolutely no or minimal intervention or processing. We aspire to operate in the natural mostly unprocessed edible food item like Edible oils, spices, dry fruits, pulses, grains, salts, honey, jaggery,etc.. We have already established our roots in different parts of the country to deliver the most natural and power house products to our customers. Our sense of satisfaction comes from the fact that our customers love our products and believe in us to provide them with only the best. We are based in Thane and operate in a modern facility. Our company also has a spacious warehouse built along with standards as required by the local and central authorities. It enables us to serve to meet the rising demands of our customers. We are proud to say that Amrut Shudh is the first and only brand to offer batch wise lab reports of our every product via QR Code on the product information labels.
name: First Extract AgroTech Pvt Ltd
